MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 获取可在超过原始 的生存期安全存储的 JsonElement。

span.span: Gets a JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .

returns.span: 可在超过原始 的生存期安全存储的 JsonElement。

span.span: A JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .

remarks.format: 如果此 JsonElement 本身是对`Clone`的前一次调用的输出或包含在另一个 JsonElement 中的值`Clone`, 而后者是先前调用的输出, 则此方法不会产生额外的内存分配。If this JsonElement is itself the output of a previous call to `Clone` or a value contained within another JsonElement which was the output of a previous call to `Clone`, this method results in no additional memory allocation.

summary.span: 查找当前对象中名为 的属性，返回一个指示此类属性是否存在的值。

span.span: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists.

summary.span: 如果此属性存在，该方法会将其值分配给 参数。

span.span: When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.

returns.span: 如果找到该属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format: 属性名称匹配作为序号、区分大小写的比较来执行。Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison. 如果为同一对象多次定义某个属性, 则该方法将匹配最后一个此类定义。If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

span.span: This value's is not .

param.span: 此方法返回时，包含指定属性的值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the value of the specified property.

summary.span: 查找当前对象中名为 的属性，返回一个指示此类属性是否存在的值。

span.span: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists.

summary.span: 如果此属性存在，会将其值分配给 参数。

span.span: When the property exists, its value is assigned to the argument.

returns.span: 如果找到该属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format: 属性名称匹配作为序号、区分大小写的比较来执行。Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison. 如果为同一对象多次定义某个属性, 则该方法将匹配最后一个此类定义。If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

span.span: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .

returns.span: 如果可以 形式表示数字，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: 此方法不分析 JSON 字符串值的内容。This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value. 在 .net Core 中, 如果大于`false` 或小于的值, 则此方法不会返回。On .NET Core, this method does not return `false` for values larger than or smaller than ). 相反, 它返回`false`并将或分配给`value`参数。Instead, it returns `false` and assigns or to the `value` argument.
